critique: The document is an amendment to an existing executive order regarding the President's Commission on Housing. The primary goal seems to be administrative, focusing on increasing the membership of the commission. The tone is formal and official, with no strong emotional appeals. The critique suggests that the initial scores are appropriate given the nature of the document.
